```py
from sklearn.decomposition import PCA

pca = PCA(n_components=2)

pca.fit(X_train)

X_train_pca = pca.transform(X_train)

# we have successfully reduced the entire feature set to just two variables
x0 = X_train_pca[:, 0]
x1 = X_train_pca[:, 1]
```
